content:
I'd like to propose the idea of adding an optional package.changelog field to Cargo.toml to indicate where a changelog file can be found in a package, analogous to the existing package.readme field that indicates where a README can be found, and would like to know if this is small enough to just be an issue in the rust-lang/cargo repo, or whether it needs to go through the RFC process.

(Since I'm asking here, I may as well also ask what other people here think of this idea.)
FWIW there is an RFC for this https://github.com/rust-lang/rfcs/pull/2129
